Table of Contents

Class GrpcToRestAdapter

Namespace
Ddap.Rest.Adapters
Assembly
Ddap.Rest.dll

Converts gRPC service calls to REST API endpoints. Enables REST endpoints to be derived from existing gRPC service implementations.

public class GrpcToRestAdapter
Inheritance
object
GrpcToRestAdapter
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()
object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Examples

// Register with gRPC integration:
services.AddDdap(options => { })
    .AddGrpc()
    .AddRest()
    .WithGrpcIntegration();

// Now REST endpoints will automatically use gRPC service implementations

Methods

CreateGrpcRequest<TRequest>(string?, object?, int?, int?)

Creates a gRPC request object from REST parameters.

public TRequest CreateGrpcRequest<TRequest>(string? id = null, object? data = null, int? pageNumber = null, int? pageSize = null) where TRequest : class, new()

Parameters

id string

The optional entity ID.

data object

The optional entity data.

pageNumber int?

The optional page number.

pageSize int?

The optional page size.

Returns

TRequest

The constructed request object.

Type Parameters

TRequest

The gRPC request type.

InvokeGrpcMethodAsync<TRequest, TResponse>(object, string, TRequest)

Converts a gRPC service method call to a REST-compatible result.

public Task<TResponse> InvokeGrpcMethodAsync<TRequest, TResponse>(object serviceInstance, string methodName, TRequest request) where TRequest : class where TResponse : class

Parameters

serviceInstance object

The gRPC service instance.

methodName string

The name of the method to call.

request TRequest

The request object.

Returns

Task<TResponse>

A task representing the asynchronous operation with the response.

Type Parameters

TRequest

The gRPC request type.

TResponse

The gRPC response type.

MapRestToGrpcMethod(string, string, bool)

Maps a REST HTTP method to a corresponding gRPC service method name.

public string MapRestToGrpcMethod(string httpMethod, string entityName, bool hasId)

Parameters

httpMethod string

The HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE).

entityName string

The entity name.

hasId bool

Whether the request includes an ID parameter.

Returns

string

The gRPC method name.
